raw_body: SHIRANTHI PERERA (nee MENDIS ABEYSEKARA) – Beloved wife of Bobby (B.I.A.) Perera (ex Ceylon Tobacco),​ mother of Hirantha and Sriyantha,​ mother-in-law of Manori and Sumudi,​ grandmother of Jerome,​ Janine,​ Shiveka and Shanaya,​ expired. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on 2nd Tuesday,​ 2nd from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m. and Wednesday,​ 3rd from 9 a.m. to 2.30 p.m. Burial at Dalugama Church Burial Ground at 3.30 p.m.000198
